data.name: Minecraft
data.description: A 3D sandbox game where players interact in a world made of blocks & entities, allowing for countless possibilities.

data.name: Minecraft Dungeons
data.description: An action-adventure role-playing game where you can fight together against the main antagonist of the story.

data.name: Minecraft Dungeons Arcade
data.description: An arcade adaptation of Minecraft Dungeons.

data.name: Minecraft Legends
data.description: A real-time strategy game where the player has to defend the overworld from the piglins.

data.name: Minecraft: Story Mode
data.description: An episodic point-and-click narrative-driven adventure based on Minecraft.

data.name: Minecraft Earth
data.description: A free-to-play augmented reality spin-off mobile game.
